price: Wakasema: Malipo yake ni yule ambaye ataonekana nalo yeye huyo ndiye malipo yake. Hivi ndivyo tunavyo walipa madhaalimu.
arabic: قَالُواْ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Na kwa kuwa wana wa Yaa'qub walikuwa na yakini kuwa wao hawakukiba kile kikopo walisema bila ya kusitasita: Malipo ya mwenye kuchukua hicho kikopo ni kushikwa huyo na afanywe mtumwa. Ndio hivi sisi tunavyo walipa wenye kudhulumu wakachukua mali ya watu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
